text: Wyatt Beetham Creech (born 13 October 1946) is an American-born New Zealand politician. He was Deputy Prime Minister in Jenny Shipley's National Party government from August 1998 to December 1999. In the 2003 New Year Honours, he was appointed a Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit, for services as a Member of Parliament. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of New Zealand Category:Living people Category:Politicians from California Category:People from Oceanside, California
title: Wyatt Creech
